Files

mcb_infrastructure/cache/
config.rs

1//!
2//! **Documentation**: [docs/modules/infrastructure.md](../../../../docs/modules/infrastructure.md)
3//!
4//! Cache configuration utilities
5//!
6//! Infrastructure-specific cache utilities only.
7//! Type definitions (`CacheEntryConfig`, `CacheStats`) are in mcb-domain.
8//! Use `mcb_domain::ports::{CacheEntryConfig`, `CacheStats`} directly.
9
10use mcb_domain::error::{Error, Result};
11
12/// Maximum allowed length for cache keys.
13const CACHE_KEY_MAX_LENGTH: usize = 250;
14
15/// Cache key utilities
16pub struct CacheKey;
17
18impl CacheKey {
19    /// Create a namespaced cache key
20    #[must_use]
21    pub fn namespaced(namespace: &str, key: &str) -> String {
22        format!("{namespace}:{key}")
23    }
24
25    /// Extract namespace from a namespaced key
26    #[must_use]
27    pub fn extract_namespace(key: &str) -> Option<&str> {
28        key.split(':').next()
29    }
30
31    /// Extract the key part from a namespaced key
32    #[must_use]
33    pub fn extract_key(key: &str) -> &str {
34        key.split_once(':').map_or(key, |x| x.1)
35    }
36
37    /// Validate cache key format
38    ///
39    /// # Errors
40    ///
41    /// Returns an error if the key is empty, too long, or contains invalid characters.
42    pub fn validate_key(key: &str) -> Result<()> {
43        if key.is_empty() {
44            return Err(Error::Configuration {
45                message: "Cache key cannot be empty".to_owned(),
46                source: None,
47            });
48        }
49
50        if key.len() > CACHE_KEY_MAX_LENGTH {
51            return Err(Error::Configuration {
52                message: format!("Cache key too long (max {CACHE_KEY_MAX_LENGTH} characters)"),
53                source: None,
54            });
55        }
56
57        // Check for invalid characters
58        if key
59            .chars()
60            .any(|c| c.is_control() || c == '\n' || c == '\r')
61        {
62            return Err(Error::Configuration {
63                message: "Cache key contains invalid characters".to_owned(),
64                source: None,
65            });
66        }
67
68        Ok(())
69    }
70
71    /// Sanitize a cache key by removing/replacing invalid characters
72    #[must_use]
73    pub fn sanitize_key(key: &str) -> String {
74        key.chars()
75            .map(|c| {
76                if c.is_control() || c == '\n' || c == '\r' {
77                    '_'
78                } else {
79                    c
80                }
81            })
82            .take(CACHE_KEY_MAX_LENGTH)
83            .collect()
84    }
85}
